title: Constructivist-Based University Teaching Innovation Project Design

context.prior_knowledge: Basic understanding of elementary education curriculum, foundational theories in language education
context.additional_context: A short, intensive mobile-based microlearning course enabling pre-service teachers to apply constructivist approaches to instructional design, considering smartphone-only learning environments without PCs

learning_goals: Learners can explain three or more language education innovation project design frameworks grounded in constructivist teaching theories.
Learners can apply constructivist principles (contextual learning, reflective thinking, etc.) to designing collaborative learning activities in mobile environments with over 80% fidelity.
Learners can write a critical report analyzing the gap between theory and practice when developing instructional innovation projects.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
